title: Reina International Auto logo
content:
Please help identify the "Reina" font. The 'R" and "a" have made this tough for me to find this font. Thank you for your help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724104932im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ReinaAutosRESIZE_5857.jpg)
author: mvajda62

comments.content: ITC Bookman Medium is going to get you pretty close, although there are a few quirks in the logo like the tail on the lowercase 'e' and slightly narrower proportions in general that you might need to tweak
Thanks. I did use Bookman but it was a major project to recreate the logo. I know I;ve seen the actual font years ago. Thanks again. If anyone does know the font I'd love to know.
